Package org.servlet.filters

This package contains general purpose servlet filters and their associated classes and listners.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppTest
    Unit test for simple App.
    AuthenticationFilter
    This filter is used for Authentication.
    CachingHttpHeadersFilter
    This filter is used in production, to put HTTP cache headers with a long (1 month) expiration time.
    CharacterEncodingFilter
    Sets the request and/or response character encoding based on the presence of either or both of the following init params, CharacterEncodingFilter.REQUEST_CHARSET_NAME CharacterEncodingFilter.RESPONSE_CHARSET_NAME.
    ClientCertFilter
    ClientCertFilter is a filter which can be used to restrict access to a servlet by verifying aspects of the client certificate chain given to the servlet.
    ErrorFilter
    Alternative to Spring Boot's ErrorPageFilter which was causing problems with other filters, because it was trying to send errors after a response was committed.
    RequestDumperFilter
    Example filter that dumps interesting state information about a request to the associated servlet context log file, before allowing the servlet to process the request in the usual way.
    RequestLoggingFilter
    Servlet Filter implementation class RequestLoggingFilter
    RequestMethodFilter
    RequestMethodFilter is a filter which can be used to restrict access to a servlet by using any of the methods available in javax.servlet.ServletRequest or javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest.
    SessionAttributeFilter
    SessionAttributeFilter is a filter which can be used to redirect requests based on attributes found in the session.
    SessionTrackingFilter
    This filter is used to track session.
    StaticResourcesProductionFilter
    This filter is used in production, to serve static resources generated by "grunt build".
    TimerFilter
    Servlet filter that records the duration of all requests.

Package org.servlet.filters Description

This package contains general purpose servlet filters and their associated classes and listners.
Author:
shivam
